summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas Municipal Library Board is convening a special called meeting on December 12, 2023, at 4:00 PM at the Central Library. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss the Library’s Strategic & Facilities Plan, which aims to enhance library services and infrastructure.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Call to Order by Chair Thomas Perryman.
2. Presentation on the Library’s Strategic & Facilities Plan by Group4.

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will focus on the strategic direction and facility improvements for the Dallas Public Library system. This may include discussions on resource allocation, service enhancements, and potential facility upgrades to better serve the community. 

**Action Items**:  
The board will seek to review and potentially approve recommendations from the Strategic & Facilities Plan presentation. Further decisions may involve budget considerations for proposed projects and initiatives stemming from the plan. 

Participants wishing to speak must register 24 hours in advance, and accommodations are available for those needing assistance. A video stream of the meeting will be accessible 24 hours post-adjournment.
